definition: Buddhist image/statue of Buddha or Bodhisattva/CL:尊[zun1], 張|张[zhang1]
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Daniel, beneath that Buddha statue is the Dazangwang Hall.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，那佛像的下面就是地藏王大殿了。

sentences.english: Looking at the cave with stalactites and statues, how also get a few million years?
sentences.chinese: 看着洞裏的鐘乳石和石佛像，怎麼也得個幾萬年吧？

sentences.english: Buddha statue brings life to the stone remnants of Angkor Thom.
sentences.chinese: 佛像爲吳哥城的石頭遺蹟帶來了生機。

sentences.english: Spirit should be the temple, wisdom to release the monks side by hand touching the edge repair figure of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 靈應寺內，智釋和尚正在邊用手觸摸邊修補佛像。

sentences.english: Saying, resemble old gentleman moving left of figure of Buddha again.
sentences.chinese: 說著，又將老君像搬到佛像左面去。

sentences.english: Several temples in Kyoto have seen their Buddha statues disappear in recent months.
sentences.chinese: 最近幾個月，京都好幾個寺廟均發生佛像丟失事件。

sentences.english: Under the blazing sun, there is a monk carrying out his practice in front of the huge Buddha statue.
sentences.chinese: 豔陽高照，還是有喇嘛頂著烈日在大佛像前做功課。

sentences.english: The old lady fell down in adoration before Buddhist images.
sentences.chinese: 那老太太在佛像面前頂禮膜拜。

sentences.english: I will leave the tigers and the statues in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我會讓老虎和佛像平靜地留在這裏。

sentences.english: I mean the copper Buddha you wanted.
sentences.chinese: 我是指妳想要的那尊銅製佛像。

sentences.english: The giant Buddha statues at Bamian in Afghanistan lay on the same road.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗巴米安巨大的佛像躺臥在相同的道路上。

sentences.english: Looking at those majestic and lofty figures of Buddha, could one ever tell how Buddhism in Dunhuang is influenced by alien arts?
sentences.chinese: 一尊尊美麗莊重的佛像，有哪些域外藝術的影響？

sentences.english: Such was the work to which Buddha gave himself with unsparing zeal for over forty years.
sentences.chinese: 這是工作的佛像了自己的不留情的熱情超過四十年。

sentences.english: The Grand Buddha is standing straight near the Taihu Lake in Wuxi.
sentences.chinese: 大佛像站在附近連續在無錫太湖。

sentences.english: They laid their gifts at the feet of the statue of the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 他們將供品放在佛像腳下。

sentences.english: They were poised on the historic Silk Road that united people.
sentences.chinese: 這些佛像佇立在把人們聯結在一起的絲綢之路上。

definition: niche for statue (esp. Buddhist, Christian etc)
stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
icon/iconic/religious image/figure (of Confucius, Buddha, Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1]
seated image (of a Buddha or saint)
rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
volumes of classics/volumes of scriptures/ancient scrolls
Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism/Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)
